result.execSummary:
The defendant Neil John Kindschy was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Neil John Kindschy is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Neil John Kindschy was found guilty of Criminal Damage to Property [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Apply bond on file, balance to be paid within 60 days.
DNA surcharge.
Court will reopen Count 1 if Defendant has new cases within the next 12 months.

CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Dux, ADA:  Sharon Correll, DF ATTY:  Nicholas Von Davis, DF:  Neil John Kindschy appeared. Includes 15CM268 and 15CM280. Atty Davis files plea questinairre. ADA Correll files Victim statement. Court reviews constitutional rights with def. Court finds def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights. Court reads charge and possible penalties for count two in 15CM268 , Def pleads Guilty. Court uses complaints and reports as factual basis, accepts plea and adjudicates Def guilty of count two. Count one dismissed without prejudice and three in 15CM268 is dismissed with prejudice. Count one in 15CM280 is also dismissed with prejudice. Parties make sentencing arguements. Defendant makes statement. Court questions. Count 1 will be reopened if Def has new cases within the next 12 months. Court orders Court Costs and DNA Surcharge. Def to put request for return of firearms in writing. km
Plea hearing at 10-13-2015 10:30 am

and  _X_ SIGNATURE BOND:   X__ Defendant and guarantees compliance with the terms of this bond by pledging $750.00 and understands that if the defendant does not comply with the terms of this bond, the bond will be forfeited and the defendant and/or surety may be ordered to pay the amount of the bond.

- Includes 15CM268 & 15CM280

- Bond on file.

- Not to possess a firearm

-Defendant to have a Uniformed Officer to retrieve his personal belongings.

-  It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Colleen K.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
